court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Volusia County, James R. Clayton, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James S. Purdy, Public Defender, and Leonard R. Ross, Assistant Public Defender, Daytona Beach, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Daytona Beach, and Mary G. Jolley, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
THOMPSON, MONACO and TORPY, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
